description: This file defines core data structures related to chess positions, including the representation of the board, castling rights, and logic to make moves, initialize positions, and update special rights. It is central to the chess game state management in the project.

classes.name: CastlingRights
classes.description: Represents the castling rights for each side (white and black), for king-side and queen-side.

classes.name: Position
classes.description: Represents a chess position, including the board layout, castling rights, en passant target square, halfmove clock, and fullmove number. Contains methods to modify and query the position.

methods.name: pieceAt
methods.description: Returns the piece at a specified square.

methods.name: allPieces
methods.description: Returns a list of all non-empty squares with their pieces.

methods.name: withPiece
methods.description: Returns a new Position instance with a specified piece placed at the given square.

methods.name: makeMove
methods.description: Returns a new Position after applying a move for the given side to move, handling special moves like castling and en passant.
